channel.title: Services on From the village
channel.description: Recent content in Services on From the village

item.title: Automation
item.description: Our devices water, heat, cool down etc. automatically. Rules are created and modified through the cloud. We provide manual remote control for when the unexpected happens.

item.title: In Action
item.description: Zelenik-1 is in charge of the watering system in an organic garden in Bliznatsi Village, Varna and windows and heating of a family greenhouse in Levski Village, Varna.

item.title: Monitoring
item.description: During spring and fall seasons nights often need adaptive heating. In addition, Zelenik-1 displays in real time the situation in your greenhouse so you have the peace of mind that everything is going great.

item.title: Zelenik-1
item.description: Our first product. Can automate windows, pumps, vents, watering systems, heating and others based on sensor readings. based on ESP8266 with Arduino core light sensor built in up to 6 temperature sensors up to 3 humidity sensors up to 3 groups of loads (windows, pumps, vents, watering systems, heating and others)
